ResearchProjectDef.label: Exotic Animal Prosthetics
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to use and craft exotic animal prosthetics to replace such things as tentacles, wings, echolocation organs and so on

ResearchProjectDef.label: Exotic Animal Bionics
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to use and craft exotic bionics to create bionic tentacles, wings, echolocation organs, etc

ResearchProjectDef.label: Advanced Animal Implants
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to extract certain abilities from animals and implant them in others. Ranged animal attacks can also be implanted in a different animal

ThingDef.label: simple prosthetic tentacle
ThingDef.description: Simple prosthetic tentacle. Should be able to replace almost any tentacle.

ThingDef.label: bionic tentacle
ThingDef.description: Improved bionic tentacle for animals. Should be able to replace almost any tentacle.

ThingDef.label: simple prosthetic beak
ThingDef.description: Simple prosthetic beak. Should be able to replace almost any avian-like beak.

ThingDef.label: bionic beak
ThingDef.description: Improved bionic beak for animals. Should be able to replace almost any avian-like beak.

ThingDef.label: bionic motion detector
ThingDef.description: Improved bionic motion detector for animals. This motion detector replaces echolocation organs and vibration sensors.

ThingDef.label: simple prosthetic buoyancy mechanism
ThingDef.description: Simple prosthetic buoyancy mechanism. Should be able to replace hydrogen sacs and other exotic organs keeping hovering creatures in the air.

ThingDef.label: bionic buoyancy mechanism
ThingDef.description: Improved bionic buoyancy mechanism for animals. Should be able to replace hydrogen sacs and other exotic organs keeping hovering creatures in the air.

ThingDef.label: simple prosthetic shell
ThingDef.description: Simple prosthetic shell. Should be able to replace carapaces and shells.

ThingDef.label: bionic shell
ThingDef.description: Improved bionic shell for animals. Should be able to replace carapaces and shells.

ThingDef.label: simple prosthetic wing
ThingDef.description: Simple prosthetic wing. Should be able to replace any type of wing.

ThingDef.label: bionic wing
ThingDef.description: Improved bionic wing for animals. Should be able to replace any type of wing.

ThingDef.label: simple prosthetic claw
ThingDef.description: Simple prosthetic claw. Fits animals with sharpened claws.

ThingDef.label: bionic claw
ThingDef.description: Improved bionic claw. Fits animals with sharpened claws.

ThingDef.label: goo acidifier
ThingDef.description: A goo acidifier increases the acidity of a goo's internal organs, making it explode as soon as it is downed. Basically transforms goos into biological suicide bombers.

HediffDef.description: A bionic tentacle.

RecipeDef.label: install bionic motion detector
RecipeDef.description: Installs bionic motion detector. Requires a min skill in medicine of 8.

RecipeDef.description: Installs simple buoyancy mechanism.

RecipeDef.label: install bionic buoyancy mechanism
RecipeDef.description: Installs bionic buoyancy mechanism. Requires a min skill in medicine of 8.

RecipeDef.description: Installs bionic shell. Requires a min skill in medicine of 8.

RecipeDef.description: Installs bionic wing. Requires a min skill in medicine of 8.

RecipeDef.description: Installs bionic claw. Requires a min skill in medicine of 8.

RecipeDef.label: install goo acidifier
RecipeDef.description: Install a goo acidifier.

HediffDef.label: ranged spinneret implant
HediffDef.description: An installed ranged spinneret implant. This implant will allow this creature to use a ranged stunning web attack.\n\nNote that installing this on a creature that already has a ranged spinneret will have no effect.

ThingDef.label: ranged spinneret implant
ThingDef.description: An installed ranged spinneret implant. This implant will allow this creature to use a ranged stunning web attack.\n\nNote that installing this on a creature that already has a ranged spinneret will have no effect.

RecipeDef.label: install ranged spinneret implant
RecipeDef.description: Install a ranged spinneret. This implant will allow this creature to use a ranged stunning web attack.\n\nNote that installing this on a creature that already has a ranged spinneret will have no effect.

RecipeDef.label: make a ranged spinneret implant
RecipeDef.description: Make a ranged spinneret implant from a Feralisk, Dunealisk, Blizzarisk, Cinderlisk, Junglelisk or Animalisk corpse. This implant will allow this creature to use a ranged stunning web attack.\n\nNote that installing this on a creature that already has a ranged spinneret will have no effect.

RecipeDef.label: remove ranged spinneret implant
RecipeDef.description: Remove ranged spinneret implant.

HediffDef.label: venomous spitter implant
HediffDef.description: An installed venomous spitter implant. This implant will allow this creature to use a ranged venomous spit attack.\n\nNote that installing this on a creature that already has a venomous spitter will have no effect. This implant can only be used by animals that have a mouth (and not, for example, a beak or proboscis).

ThingDef.label: venomous spitter implant
ThingDef.description: An installed venomous spitter implant. This implant will allow this creature to use a ranged venomous spit attack.\n\nNote that installing this on a creature that already has a venomous spitter will have no effect. This implant can only be used by animals that have a mouth (and not, for example, a beak or proboscis).

RecipeDef.label: install venomous spitter implant
RecipeDef.description: Install a venomous spitter. This implant will allow this creature to use a ranged venomous spit attack.\n\nNote that installing this on a creature that already has a venomous spitter will have no effect. This implant can only be used by animals that have a mouth (and not, for example, a beak or proboscis).

RecipeDef.label: make a venomous spitter implant
RecipeDef.description: Make a venomous spitter from a Black Spelopede or Blackspider corpse. This implant will allow this creature to use a ranged venomous spit attack.\n\nNote that installing this on a creature that already has a venomous spitter will have no effect. This implant can only be used by animals that have a mouth (and not, for example, a beak or proboscis).

RecipeDef.label: remove venomous spitter implant
RecipeDef.description: Remove venomous spitter implant.

HediffDef.label: acidic spitter implant
HediffDef.description: An installed acidic spitter implant. This implant will allow this creature to use a ranged acidic spit attack that causes additional damage over time.\n\nNote that installing this on a creature that already has an acidic spitter will have no effect. This implant can only be used by animals that have a mouth (and not, for example, a beak or proboscis).

ThingDef.label: acidic spitter implant
ThingDef.description: An installed acidic spitter implant. This implant will allow this creature to use a ranged acidic spit attack that causes additional damage over time.\n\nNote that installing this on a creature that already has an acidic spitter will have no effect. This implant can only be used by animals that have a mouth (and not, for example, a beak or proboscis).

RecipeDef.label: install acidic spitter implant
RecipeDef.description: Install an acidic spitter. This implant will allow this creature to use a ranged acidic spit attack that causes additional damage over time.\n\nNote that installing this on a creature that already has an acidic spitter will have no effect. This implant can only be used by animals that have a mouth (and not, for example, a beak or proboscis).

RecipeDef.label: make an acidic spitter implant
RecipeDef.description: Make an acidic spitter from a Red Goo, Green Goo, Mantrap, Red Spore or Ocular Jelly corpse. This implant will allow this creature to use a ranged acidic spit attack that causes additional damage over time.\n\nNote that installing this on a creature that already has an acidic spitter will have no effect. This implant can only be used by animals that have a mouth (and not, for example, a beak or proboscis).

RecipeDef.label: remove acidic spitter implant
RecipeDef.description: Remove acidic spitter implant.

HediffDef.label: barbed quill thrower implant
HediffDef.description: An installed barbed quill thrower implant. This implant will allow this creature to use a ranged venomous quill attack that causes toxic buildup.\n\nNote that installing this on a creature that already has a barbed quill thrower will have no effect.

ThingDef.label: barbed quill thrower implant
ThingDef.description: An installed barbed quill thrower implant. This implant will allow this creature to use a ranged venomous quill attack that causes toxic buildup.\n\nNote that installing this on a creature that already has a barbed quill thrower will have no effect.

RecipeDef.label: install barbed quill thrower implant
RecipeDef.description: Install a barbed quill thrower. This implant will allow this creature to use a ranged venomous quill attack that causes toxic buildup.\n\nNote that installing this on a creature that already has a barbed quill thrower will have no effect.

RecipeDef.label: make a barbed quill thrower implant
RecipeDef.description: Make a barbed quill thrower implant from a Night Ave, Needleroll or Needlepost corpse. This implant will allow this creature to use a ranged venomous quill attack that causes toxic buildup.\n\nNote that installing this on a creature that already has a barbed quill thrower will have no effect.

RecipeDef.label: remove barbed quill thrower implant
RecipeDef.description: Remove barbed quill thrower implant.

HediffDef.label: quad tesla cannon implant
HediffDef.description: An installed quad tesla cannon implant. This implant will allow this creature to use a powerful ranged plasma attack.\n\nNote that installing this on a creature that already has a quad tesla cannon will have no effect.

ThingDef.label: quad tesla cannon implant
ThingDef.description: An installed quad tesla cannon implant. This implant will allow this creature to use a powerful ranged plasma attack.\n\nNote that installing this on a creature that already has a quad tesla cannon will have no effect.

RecipeDef.label: install quad tesla cannon implant
RecipeDef.description: Install a quad tesla cannon. This implant will allow this creature to use a powerful ranged plasma attack.\n\nNote that installing this on a creature that already has a quad tesla cannon will have no effect.

RecipeDef.label: make a quad tesla cannon implant
RecipeDef.description: Make a quad tesla cannon implant from a Tetra slug corpse. This implant will allow this creature to use a powerful ranged plasma attack.\n\nNote that installing this on a creature that already has a quad tesla cannon will have no effect.

RecipeDef.label: remove quad tesla cannon implant
RecipeDef.description: Remove quad tesla cannon implant.

HediffDef.label: bioelectric organ implant
HediffDef.description: An installed bioelectric organ implant. This implant will allow this creature to use a powerful ranged electric attack that may paralyze and cause heart attacks.\n\nNote that installing this on a creature that already has a bioelectric organ will have no effect.

ThingDef.label: bioelectric organ implant
ThingDef.description: An installed bioelectric organ implant. This implant will allow this creature to use a powerful ranged electric attack that may paralyze and cause heart attacks.\n\nNote that installing this on a creature that already has a bioelectric organ will have no effect.

RecipeDef.label: install bioelectric organ implant
RecipeDef.description: Install a bioelectric organ. This implant will allow this creature to use a powerful ranged electric attack that may paralyze and cause heart attacks.\n\nNote that installing this on a creature that already has a bioelectric organ will have no effect.

RecipeDef.label: make a bioelectric organ implant
RecipeDef.description: Make a bioelectric organ implant from a Thunderbeast corpse. This implant will allow this creature to use a powerful ranged electric attack that may paralyze and cause heart attacks.\n\nNote that installing this on a creature that already has a bioelectric organ will have no effect.

RecipeDef.label: remove bioelectric organ implant
RecipeDef.description: Remove bioelectric organ implant.

HediffDef.label: light focusing lens implant
HediffDef.description: An installed light focusing lens implant. This implant will allow this creature to use a powerful ranged laser attack that sets enemies on fire.\n\nNote that installing this on a creature that already has a light focusing lens will have no effect. This implant takes the space of one of the creature's eyes, so it can't be installed in eyeless animals.

ThingDef.label: light focusing lens implant
ThingDef.description: An installed light focusing lens implant. This implant will allow this creature to use a powerful ranged laser attack that sets enemies on fire.\n\nNote that installing this on a creature that already has a light focusing lens will have no effect. This implant takes the space of one of the creature's eyes, so it can't be installed in eyeless animals.

RecipeDef.label: install light focusing lens implant
RecipeDef.description: Install a light focusing lens. This implant will allow this creature to use a powerful ranged laser attack that sets enemies on fire.\n\nNote that installing this on a creature that already has a light focusing lens will have no effect. This implant takes the space of one of the creature's eyes, so it can't be installed in eyeless animals.

RecipeDef.label: make a light focusing lens implant
RecipeDef.description: Make a light focusing lens implant from a Crystalline Caracal corpse. This implant will allow this creature to use a powerful ranged laser attack that sets enemies on fire.\n\nNote that installing this on a creature that already has a light focusing lens will have no effect. This implant takes the space of one of the creature's eyes, so it can't be installed in eyeless animals.

RecipeDef.label: remove light focusing lens implant
RecipeDef.description: Remove light focusing lens implant.

HediffDef.label: hyper acidic stomach implant
HediffDef.description: An installed hyper acidic stomach implant. This implant will allow this creature to use a ranged acid attack that causes damage over time.\n\nNote that installing this on a creature that already has a hyper acidic stomach will have no effect. This implant takes the space of the creature's stomach, so it can't be installed in animals that lack one.

ThingDef.label: hyper acidic stomach implant
ThingDef.description: An installed hyper acidic stomach implant. This implant will allow this creature to use a ranged acid attack that causes damage over time.\n\nNote that installing this on a creature that already has a hyper acidic stomach will have no effect. This implant takes the space of the creature's stomach, so it can't be installed in animals that lack one.

RecipeDef.label: install hyper acidic stomach implant
RecipeDef.description: Install a hyper acidic stomach. This implant will allow this creature to use a ranged acid attack that causes damage over time.\n\nNote that installing this on a creature that already has a hyper acidic stomach will have no effect. This implant takes the space of the creature's stomach, so it can't be installed in animals that lack one.

RecipeDef.label: make a hyper acidic stomach implant
RecipeDef.description: Make a hyper acidic stomach implant from an Erin corpse. This implant will allow this creature to use a ranged acid attack that causes damage over time.\n\nNote that installing this on a creature that already has a hyper acidic stomach will have no effect. This implant takes the space of the creature's stomach, so it can't be installed in animals that lack one.

RecipeDef.label: remove hyper acidic stomach implant
RecipeDef.description: Remove hyper acidic stomach implant.
